"Ah!":
"I take my eye off of you for a second,
and look at how much you've grown."

"We're all walking different paths now,
but it still feels like we're always together."

"As if it's still totally normal for us to
just stand around talking like this."
"Even seperated, our hearts are as one."
"We'll always be a team, no matter what."
"We'll always be a team, no matter what..."

"Regardless of what awaits us in the future,
our friendship won't ever change."
